page.title: 17Guide celebrations cont.
page.content: Our district commissioner saved the candle until the next week when we had another celebration on Askam beach with all the brownies and guides in our district to pass on the birthday candle.The guides collected fire wood to build a campfire.They also made a guide trefoil in sand to put the birthday candle in.The brownies had a sand castle building competition while the guides were busy collecting firewood.The sandcastle competition was very hard to judge. There were some very attractive ones.The winner had shells on it,it was very good. After the competion they played "silly games".Towards the end of the evening we had a campfire and then tried to light our birthday candles but it was very windy so the candles blew out. Even so every one enjoyed themselves. .
